articles.title: Weekly Tech Recap: Nothing Phone (2a) launch, Gemini AI controversy and more - Mint
articles.description: This week's tech highlights include Samsung's budget-friendly Galaxy F15 5G, Google's Gemini AI controversy, Apple's M3 chip in new MacBook Air models, Nothing Phone 2a launch, iOS 17.4 update, Realme 12 5G series debut, and more.
articles.content: As the tech world continues to evolve at a rapid pace, this week witnessed a deluge of exciting developments, from the launch of new smartphones to significant software updates and groundbreaking inn… [+6040 chars]

articles.title: NASA Europa Clipper to carry unique message to Jupiter's moon, packed with Earth's essence - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA's Europa Clipper, set to launch in October, carries a unique message to Jupiter's moon Europa, featuring a poetic tribute, names from the public, and symbolic artwork.
articles.content: In a celestial nod to human creativity and curiosity, NASA is set to launch its Europa Clipper spacecraft in October, bound for Jupiter's moon Europa. Nestled within the spacecraft is a symbolic mess… [+2579 chars]

articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: OpenAI announces new board members, reinstates CEO Sam Altman - TechCrunch
articles.description: OpenAI has announced new additions to its board of directors, including CEO Sam Altman, who lost his seat in a power struggle months ago.
articles.content:
Sam Altman, the CEO of OpenAI, has a seat at the table — or board, rather — once again.
OpenAI today announced that Altman will be rejoining the company’s board of directors several months after los… [+4867 chars]

articles.title: Bus-Size Asteroid Flew Closer Than The Moon - Watch The Orbit Animation - video Dailymotion - Dailymotion
articles.description: Asteroid 2024 DW flew about 139,000 miles (224,000 km) away from Earth. The space rock was estimated to be about 43 feet wide (13 m).   Credit: Space.com | animation: NASA/JPL-Caltech | edited by Steve Spaleta Music: Black Bullet by Deskant / courtesy of Epid…
